featured.text: Girls’ names such as Faith, Patience, and Sophie (wisdom) are chosen because they symbolize Christian qualities.
The third kind is called “health spas,” or “faith healing.”

definition.zh_def: 對某人或某事的信任或相信，通常不需要證據或證明。
definition.en_def: A strong belief or trust in someone or something, often without requiring proof.
definition.example: She has faith that everything will work out in the end.
